name: Downloadify
tagline: Simple Chrome Extension to Download all Spotify Songs
body:
# downloadify

So spotify made a great html5 player for their service: https://play.spotify.com
But they forgot their encription... NICE! :)

!!!!!!!!!!!!DISCLAIMER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hey I don't like encription but love spotify, just pay them for your content and I am sure
they fix it soon ( like create a corrupted mp3 and fix it with the html5 file api ).

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

[Install the Chrome Extension](https://github.com/raldenhoven/downloadify/raw/master/spotify-chrome.crx)

After download open chrome, go to tools->extensions (dashed icon next to your search bar) enable developer mode and drag the downloaded file into your browser.

Go to [https://play.spotify.com](https://play.spotify.com) play a song and watch your download folder!

Please follow me on twitter [@raldenhoven](https://twitter.com/rAldenhoven)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
